mapper.sql: a.ID as "id" , a.nls as "nls" , a.xls as "xls" , a.xbs as "xbs" , a.REMARKS as "remarks" , a.ENABLE_FLAG as "enableFlag" , a.DEL_FLAG as "delFlag" , a.CREATE_BY as "createBy" , a.CREATE_DATE as "createDate" , a.UPDATE_BY as "updateBy" , a.UPDATE_DATE as "updateDate"
mapper.select:
SELECT count(1) FROM T_SYS_rsxxzhtj a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_SYS_rsxxzhtj( ID , nls , xls , xbs , REMARKS , ENABLE_FLAG , DEL_FLAG , CREATE_BY , CREATE_DATE , UPDATE_BY , UPDATE_DATE ) values( #{id} , #{nls} , #{xls} , #{xbs} , #{remarks} , #{enableFlag} , #{delFlag} , #{createBy} , #{createDate} , #{updateBy} , #{updateDate} )
